com.github.xemiru.sponge.boxboy.button

Class ToggleButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.xemiru.sponge.boxboy.button.ToggleButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Button

    public class ToggleButton
extends Object
implements Button
    A Button implementation that switches between two states defined by two provided ActionButtons.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static ToggleButton of(ActionButton stateA,
                              ActionButton stateB)
        Creates a new ToggleButton using the two provided state buttons.

        The state button is activated when become the active state -- stateB's Button.onClick(ClickContext) will be activated first.

        Parameters:
        stateA - the true state of the ToggleButton
        stateB - the false state of the ToggleButton
        Returns:
        the new ToggleButton

      • of

        public static ToggleButton of(ActionButton stateA,
                              ActionButton stateB,
                              boolean defaultState)
        Creates a new ToggleButton using the two provided state buttons.

        The state button is activated when becoming the active state -- stateB's Button.onClick(ClickContext) will be activated first if the default state of the ToggleButton is true.

        Parameters:
        stateA - the true state of the ToggleButton
        stateB - the false state of the ToggleButton
        defaultState - the default state of the ToggleButton
        Returns:
        the new ToggleButton

      • getCurrentState

        public boolean getCurrentState()
        Returns the current state of this ToggleButton as a boolean.
        Returns:
        the state of this ToggleButton

      • getCurrentStateButton

        public ActionButton getCurrentStateButton()
        Returns the ActionButton assigned to the current state of this ToggleButton.
        Returns:
        the representative ActionButton of this ToggleButton's current state

      • getRepresentative

        public ItemStack getRepresentative()
        Description copied from interface: Button
        Returns the ItemStack representing this Button.
        Specified by:
        getRepresentative in interface Button
        Returns:
        the ItemStack currently representing this Button

      • getAnimatedRepresentative

        public Optional<Animation<ItemStack>> getAnimatedRepresentative()
        Description copied from interface: Button
        Returns the animated representative of this Button.

        This representative takes priority over Button.getRepresentative(). Should this return empty, menus will instead make use of the previous method to get the final representative item.

        Specified by:
        getAnimatedRepresentative in interface Button
        Returns:
        the animated representative ItemStack of this Button

      • onClick

        public void onClick(ClickContext context)
        Description copied from interface: Button
        Performs an action when clicked.

        This method is called after Button.offer(OfferContext).

        Specified by:
        onClick in interface Button
        Parameters:
        context - the context associated with the click
